title: rpgparty (current)
bullets: Online D&D-like multiplayer role playing game for small groups.
Create your own adventure with game map and quest editors.
Custom isometric tile rendering engine.

title: mathtalk
bullets: Web-based forum application deployed on Heroku.
Create and reply to posts with integrated LaTeX typesetting.
User registration, login/logout, JWT authentication.
Query filter, infinite wall effect.

title: passman
bullets: Windows password manager application.
Custom RSA-like encryption algorithm based on Fermat's little theorem.

title: SyllabusCreator
bullets: Contributed course calendar and webscraper modules.
Worked with Agile, Scrum team framework.
Provided deliverable code in incremental project development sprints.

title: ReactWeatherApp
bullets: Get Weather by zip code via OpenWeatherMap API.
Get area map via Google Maps API.

title: sinapprox
bullets: Continuous least squares polynomial approximation of sine function derived in Matlab/Octave.
Measure accuracy and performance of C++ and SIMD Intrinsics implementations of Horner's Method.

title: playbilliards
technologies: Google App Engine, Python, JavaScript, Jquery
bullets: Two player game of pool deployed on Google App Engine.
Client-side animation in HTML5 Canvas and JavaScript.
Server-side collision physics engine in Python.

title: seurat
bullets: Windows Drawing Application.
Supports Multiple Image Formats. .bmp, .gif, etc.
Multiple Drawing Tools. Pencil, Curve, Bucket, etc.
Image zoom and pan, transparancy and layers.

title: tuple generator
bullets: Recursive algorithm to count over n-tuples.
Direct mapping of natural number to n-tuple and inverse.
Solve multivariate Diophantine equations by brute-force.

title: bresenham lines
bullets: C# implementation of bresenham line drawing algorithm.

title: tree visualizer
bullets: Python Binary and AVL Tree implementation.
Output tree to visual representation.

title: Mandelbrot Viewer
bullets: Zoom, Pan, and Rotate.
Custom Complex number class.
